data.text: A Nzambi, mutu wowo ndieti zitisa
Bila batu bambimbi ayi batu bansadilanga bukhita
Mu mambu ma kikhenene, banzungididi
Mu kikundi kiama, balembo mfundi
Baphutudidi mambimbi mu mamboti
Sobula mutu wumbimbi mu diambu kakba mbeni andi ;
Mu thangu kela samba, bika kaba monika mu nzimbala
Bika bilumbu biandi bikituka bifioti.
Bika bana bandi baba bana basana ;
Bika bana bandi baba mindiengidi mikuenda lombingi ;
Bika mutu wowo weti devisa kabonga bima bioso biobi kavuidi ;
Bika kubika ba mutu wulenda kumvangila mamboti
Bika nkunꞌandi wulalakana ;
Bika mambimbi ma bakulu bandi matebukulungu moyo va ntuala Yave,
Bika masumu mawu mazingila mu zithangu zioso va ntuala Yave
Bila kalendi yindula mu vanga mamboti ko,
Niandi wuzola singa ; bika yimbuila,
Wuvuata tsingulu banga nledi andi ;
Bika yawu yikituka banga yunga kioki kakukifukila ;
Bika buawu bobo bubela mfutu wu Yave kuidi mimfundi miama ;
Vayi ngeyo Yave, mutu wumvanganga mawu zodidi,
Ndidi nkua kiadi ayi nsukami
Ndieka lalakana banga kitsusula va masika ;
Makuma mama malembo bulangama
Minu ndieka diambu di mvuezolo kuidi mimfundi miama ;
Wutsadisa, a Yave, Nzambi ama ;
Bika bazaba ti koko kuaku ;
Bawu balembo singi vayi ngeyo wela sakumuna.
Mimfundi miama milendi vuata nzitusu ko
Mu munu ama, ndiela yayisa ngolo Yave ;
Bila niandi wuntelamanga va koko ku lubakala lu nsukami
